title: Diesel Mechanic #504
full_description: Urgently looking for two Diesel Mechanics for shop positions in Tacoma, Washington. Mid-level or "B" experience with heavy truck/trailer diagnosis and repair. Utilize OEM software and gain experience with a variety of brands and manufacturers ranging from Cummins, Detroit Diesel and Caterpillar. Stable fleet opportunity with preventative maintenance, inspections, running repair, in-depth diagnosis & troubleshooting, and major repair. Ideally seeking a right hand assistant for the lead technician. Days shift available: 9am - 5:30pm.Second shift available: 12pm - 8:30pm.
